name: onet.pl - dostosowanie wyswietlania newsow
description:
W prosty sposob ustawisz, ktore bloki z newsami beda wyswietlane, a ktore nie (m.in. Wiadomosci, Sport, Biznes itd.)
Usuwa również reklamy.
css:
/**
autor: szocik89

aktualizacja 16.08.2012
nowa wersja jest troche naokolo ale dziala
*/

@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document url("http://www.onet.pl/") {

div#onet-ad-top                               {display: none;} /* Reklama flash na górze */
div.ad_boxright1                              {display: none;} /* Reklama flash */
div.ad_boxright2                              {display: none;} /* Reklama flash */
div.ad_boxright3                              {display: none;} /* Reklama flash */
div.ad_boxright4                              {display: none;} /* Reklama flash */
div.ad_boxright5                              {display: none;} /* Reklama flash */
div.ad_boxright6                              {display: none;} /* Reklama flash */
div.ad_boxright7                              {display: none;} /* Reklama flash */
div.ad_boxright8                              {display: none;} /* Reklama flash */


div.nnsrRecommend                             {display: block;} /* Polecamy */ 

article#boxToday div.boxHeader, 
article#boxToday span.dateDay, 
article#boxToday span.dateMonth, 
article#boxToday span.nameDay, 
article#boxToday ul.noTitle                   {display: none;} /* Dzisiaj */  

article#boxToday div.changeCity, 
article#boxToday div.weather                  {display: block;} /* Pogoda */  

article#boxNews div.boxHeader, 
article#boxNews div.boxContent, 
article#boxNews ul.moreNews                   {display: none;} /* Wiadomości */ 

article#boxSport div.boxHeader, 
article#boxSport div.boxContent, 
article#boxSport ul.moreNews                  {display: none;} /* Sport */ 

article#boxEconomy div.boxHeader, 
article#boxEconomy div.boxContent, 
article#boxEconomy div.boxRatings, 
article#boxEconomy ul.moreNews                {display: none;} /* Biznes */ 

article#boxLocalNews div.boxHeader, 
article#boxLocalNews div.boxContent, 
article#boxLocalNews ul.moreNews              {display: block;} /* Wiadomości lokalne */  

article#boxMoto div.boxHeader, 
article#boxMoto div.boxContent, 
article#boxMoto ul.moreNews                   {display: block;} /* Motoryzacja */ 

article#boxTech div.boxHeader, 
article#boxTech div.boxContent, 
article#boxTech ul.moreNews                   {display: block;} /* Technologie i gry */  

article#boxStars div.boxHeader, 
article#boxStars div.boxContent, 
article#boxStars li.item-1, 
article#boxStars li.item-2                    {display: none;} /* Życie gwiazd */ 

article#boxLifestyle div.boxHeader, 
article#boxLifestyle div.boxContent, 
article#boxLifestyle li.item-1, 
article#boxLifestyle li.item-2                {display: none;} /* Styl życia */  

article#boxAfterHours div.boxHeader, 
article#boxAfterHours div.boxContent, 
article#boxAfterHours ul.moreNews             {display: none;} /* Po godzinach */ 

article#boxVideoOnDemand div.boxHeader, 
article#boxVideoOnDemand div.boxContent, 
article#boxVideoOnDemand div.posterSlider, 
article#boxVideoOnDemand ul.newsBoxGallery, 
article#boxVideoOnDemand ul.moreNews          {display: none;} /* Filmy i seriale */ 

article#boxVideoOffer div.boxHeader, 
article#boxVideoOffer div.boxContent, 
article#boxVideoOffer ul.newsBoxGallery, 
article#boxVideoOffer ul.moreNews             {display: none;} /* Wideo dnia */ 

article#boxAfterHours div.boxHeader, 
article#boxAfterHours div.boxContent, 
article#boxAfterHours ul.moreNews             {display: none;} /* Po godzinach */ 

article#boxAutopromo div.boxHeader, 
article#boxAutopromo div.boxContent, 
article#boxAutopromo ul.moreNews              {display: none;} /* W onecie */ 

article#boxEntertainment div.boxHeader, 
article#boxEntertainment div.boxContent, 
article#boxEntertainment ul.moreNews          {display: none;} /* Rozrywka */ 

div#pageOtherContent                          {display: none;} /* Katalog WWW + 
                                                                  Oferty sponsorowane + 
                                                                  Reklamy */ 




/* wersja sprzed sierpnia 2012:

div.sdb-wdgc         {display: none;}   /* Caly lewy panel *

div.nsrNews          {display: block;}  /* Wiadomości *
div.nsrSport         {display: none;}   /* Sport *
div.nsrEconomy       {display: none;}   /* Biznes *
div.nsrLocalNews     {display: none;}   /* Wiadomosci lokalne *
div.nsrMoto          {display: block;}  /* Motoryzacja *
div.nsrTech          {display: block;}  /* Technologie *
div.nsrEntertainment {display: none;}   /* Rozrywka *
div.nsrStars         {display: none;}   /* Zycie gwaizd *
div.nsrLifestyle     {display: none;}   /* Styl życia *
div.nsrAfterHours    {display: none;}   /* Po godzinach *
div.nsrAutopromo     {display: none;}   /* W onecie *

div.nsrRecommend     {display: block;}  /* Polecamy *
div.nsrVideo         {display: none;}   /* Wideo *
div.nsrCommunity     {display: none;}   /* Waszym zdaniem *
div.nsrShopping      {display: none;}   /* Galeria handlowa *
div.nsrAd            {display: none;}   /* Strefa ogłoszeń *
div.nsrCatalog       {display: none;}   /* Katalog WWW *
div.nsrFooter        {display: none;}   /* Stopka *

*/
}
